nodes.text: The Stark Hyperspace War was a conflict that was fought prior to the Clone Wars between the Jedi Order and pirates. Jedi Master Saesee Tiin was a veteran of the Stark Hyperspace War.

The Stark Hyperspace War was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in Star Wars: Force Collection. The Stark Hyperspace War was originally created for the Star Wars Legends comic Star Wars 36, released on November 28, 2001.
